des: Our Blueberry-Dijon Chicken may seem like a strange combination, but prepare to be pleasantly surprised. I add a sprinkling of minced fresh basil as the finishing touch.
Our Blackberry-Sauced Pork Chops are as tasty in a skillet as they are grilled, so you can eat them all year long.
Fresh picked summer in early summer are used to make this desserts. Our blackberry pie is a real stunner and people pleaser.
